THIS GAME IS SO ADDICTING......

I've played for years and I finally snapped today.

My 75-year old mother asked me to help her cut some vegetables for dinner (Dumb bitch has been trying to get me to "help around the house more, now that I am 38"). What she didn't know was that I was in my Silver 1 promo's. 

"In a few minutes, let me finish up this game" I said hoping she would understand.

she didn't. 

now her anger even more pronounced as she berates me with insults 

O shit here we go again. 

Being accustomed to this, I knew there was only one way to make her stop, I had to assert my dominance.

I looked her dead in the eye and said "I'm playing cs:go". 

It didn't work.

She looked unfazed and proceeded to turn off my 2007 limited edition Dell Latitude. 

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO"

I stormed into the washroom and in an act to calm myself down, took an upper-decker.

But it wasn't enough......not enough to to quell my fury. 

I injected two syringes of fish oil into my right bicep, walked into the kitchen and grabbed my mother's puny skull. 

She looked at me, pale, lifeless. she knew what was coming.

For the next 10 minutes i repeatedly bashed her dumb apron-wearing, dish-washing, sandwich-making face into the kitchen counter. After exclaiming "I'm playing cs:go", I stormed back to my laptop, turned it on and apologised to my teammates for my shitty internet. 

5/5 best fucking game
Отыграл 1500 часов на разных аккаунтов, что могу сказать игра просто бомба!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
